events.title: Cybersecurity Workshop
events.description: Hands-on workshop on ethical hacking techniques, penetration testing, and network security fundamentals.

events.title: CTF Challenge
events.description: Participate in a Capture The Flag (CTF) cybersecurity competition and solve real-world challenges.

events.title: Webinar: Ethical Hacking 101
events.description: Learn the basics of ethical hacking, web vulnerabilities, and security best practices in this live webinar.

events.title: Linux Security Lab
events.description: Interactive lab session to practice Linux hardening, security auditing, and penetration testing techniques.

events.title: Networking Exploitation Workshop
events.description: Learn network security analysis, packet capture, and ethical exploitation in practical exercises.
